name: Summer Tomatoes
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: extra virgin olive oil, tomato, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 or 3 large ripe tomatoes (or more if you wish)
A few sprigs fresh oregano to yield 2 teaspoons

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and trim tomatoes and cut into thick slices.
Wash and remove the leaves from the oregano, and sprinkle over tomato slices. Drizzle with oil, and serve.
